bike.description: All new 06 M4 SJ Hardtail, Designs for Women, M4 alloy ORE DT & TT, fully manipulated TT, SS, CS, Asymmetric Mono-stay seatstays, disc and rim brake compatible, replaceable derailleur hanger

Avid SD-5R cantilevers, cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housing
